desc: 20% boost to all parameters & boosts BC, HC, Karma drop rates

dictionary.lore: A lifetime of happy holiday memories made whole with a beautiful ornament crafted from precious jewels and metals. Legend has it that the shine of this lovely relic can even make wishes come true, albeit for a limited time. Could there be any truth behind this myth? After all, winter nights are said to be the most magical of all...

name: Shiny Bauble
